page.title: 07HOBBIES IN STRACHAN
page.content:
(SAMPLE OF 40 HOUSEHOLDS) 64 people go to the{theatre or cinema fairly often. 40 people sometimes go to{concerts;}24 people{play a musical {instrument}of some kind;34 people {listen to classical music;}66 people like to{listen to pop music.
There is also a variety of{craft work done ,including modelling,embroidery, upholstery and tapestry.
Only 1 household did not regularly {watch television.}Of those who watched 2 households watched very little, 8 watched about 2 hours per day,8 house -holds watched for 3 hours, 6 watched about 4 hours and 12 households more.
